versos: (makkedah) Joshua 10:10 - The Lord threw them into confusion before Israel
(gardens) "I made myself gardens and parks, and planted in them all kinds of fruit trees." - Ecclesiastes 2:5;;;
(agag) 1 Samuel 15:8 - He took agag king of the Amalekites alive
(workman) 2 Timothy 2:15 - "Do your best to present yourself to God as one approved, a workman who does not need to be ashamed and who correctly handles the word of truth.";;;
(arrows) Psalm 127:4 - "Like arrows in the hands of a warrior are children born in one's youth.";;;
(star) Numbers 24:17 - "I see him, but not now; I behold him, but not near. A star will come out of Jacob; a scepter will rise out of Israel.";;;

(puttest) 1 Samuel 26:23 - "The Lord render to every man his righteousness and his faithfulness: for the Lord delivered thee into my hand to day, but I would not stretch forth mine hand against the Lord's anointed.";;;
(nest) Proverbs 27:8 - Like a bird that flees its nest is anyone who flees from home.;;;
(weeping) Psalm 30:5 - For his anger is but for a moment; his favor is for a lifetime. weeping may linger for the night, but joy comes with the morning.;;;
(hepher) 1 Chronicles 27:15 - The twelfth for the twelfth month was Helez the Netophathite

(bond) Romans 8:15 - "The Spirit you received does not make you slaves, so that you live in fear again; rather, the Spirit you received brought about your adoption to sonship. And by him we cry, 'Abba, Father.'";;;
(bonds) Psalm 68:6 - "God sets the soliatry in families; he leads out the prisoners in bonds, but the rebellious dwell in a parched land.";;;
(uttered) Psalm 19:2 - "Day after day they pour forth speech; night after night they reveal knowledge.";;;
(warred) Deuteronomy 2:34 - "At that time we took all his towns and completely destroyed themmen, women and children. We left no survivors.";;;
(fenced) Ezekiel 22:30 - "I looked for someone among them who would build up the wall and stand before me in the gap on behalf of the land so I would not have to destroy it, but I found no one.";;;

(subdued) Genesis 1:28 - "God blessed them and said to them, 'Be fruitful and increase in number; fill the earth and subdue it. Rule over the fish in the sea and the birds in the sky and over every living creature that moves on the ground.'";;;
(jair) Judges 10:3 - jair the Gileadite judged Israel twenty-two years.;;;
